COMMENT_TX: $Bobby Adams called for interference for running into his own batted ball

$game called for Sunday curfew

$One Cub runner reached base on E3 in 7th or 8th; it is put here as the first opportunity
$Clear that Mauch for Greenberg AFTER Hank reached third
$Frank McCormick rounded 2B too far
$during the 2nd inning Billy Herman argued loudly with Phillies manager Ben Chapman; 1B umpire Al Barlick warned them

$the fifth pitch to Carl Furillo was ruled a caught foul tip for strike 3 by HP umpire Bill Stewart but the Dodgers argued the call; 1B umpire Lee Ballanfant ruled the ball had stuck in the catcher's pad for a foul ball
$Dixie Howell called for interference for running into his own bunt
$ball four rolled to the backstop
$Tiny Bonham left with heat exhaustion
$Harry Walker fell between 1B and 2B
